name: Lane Girls
description:
In the distant future, because of an unknown reason, a high-dimension creature called the Deep Sea come into being on the earth.
On the other side, another mysterious power - Warship Girls also appear to maintain the justice.
To protect our homeland, all of human beings, including you, will be able to manage a fleet of various Warship Girls to conquer each and every corner of the vast ocean where Deep Sea live in!
【Game Features】
- 3D RTS Naval Warfare Game with Two Cameras in Battle Scene
Experience the real naval warfare, the fight with different lineups and unique Constellation QTE skill
-100+ Well-Known Warship Girls and Stunning Costumes
Collect different types of Warship Girls and dress them with pajama, Wedding Dress, Maid Suit and so on.
- Romance with Warship Girls Gameplay
Date your girl, send gift to her and even marry her, all of these are possible here!
-3D Spa Bikini Training
100+ Girls dressed Bikini in outdoor spa for training can also boost power rapidly
-Innovative Card Game Mixed with SLG
Say goodbye to those traditional card games; This game allows you to fight alongside warship girls and aim for the king of PVP Mode.
-DIY Room
Decorate your room with countless furniture and make it cozy for your girls.
-Grand Cast of Voice Actresses for Each Warship Girl
Enjoy the ear feast provided by famous Voice Actresses, such as Minase Inori, Asami Imai, Aya Uchida and so on.
** SUPPORT **
Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/Lanegirls
